remarks: A subset of ` A ^ I ` , where ` A C_ CC ` , is totally bounded iff it is bounded.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Sep-2015.)
statement:
cnpwstotbnd.y $e |- Y = ( ( CCfld |`s A ) ^s I ) $.
cnpwstotbnd.d $e |- D = ( ( dist ` Y ) |` ( X X. X ) ) $.
cnpwstotbnd $p |- ( ( A C_ CC /\ I e. Fin ) -> ( D e. ( TotBnd ` X ) <-> D e. ( Bnd ` X ) ) ) $.
